pages.text: The maid will hurt the player, and even other maids or pets. The hata sasimono is designed for this purpose.

Craft a hata sasimono, then right-click on the maid can add hata sasimono to the maid. You can find the corresponding button to switch the style of hata sasimono in the main GUI.$(br2)You can also customize your own hata sasimono, and you can check the wiki for instructions.
